description:
With Kongo out of danger, Awatsuki finishes the task of having her psychometrist friend probe the kitten`s memories. What Saten hears gives her pause, and she turns to Kuroko for advice. Kozaku confronts Mikoto, asking her about the Sisters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auribus Oculi Fideliores Sunt. (The Eyes Are More Trustworthy Than the Ears)
Auribus Oculi Fideliores Sunt. Miru Koto wa Kiku Koto yori Shinjiru ni Atai Suru
Auribus oculi fideliores sunt. 見ることは聞くことより信じるに値する
La vision est plus fiable que l`ouïe
